lastSession.summary: Fix version tracking and stale state detection (v4.5.1)
completedTasks: Deleted stale loops/state.json with feature-013 false positive
Made setup.md version dynamic (reads from plugin.json)
Fixed setup.sh to use $PLUGIN_VERSION variable everywhere
Fixed init.sh template to read version from .plugin-version at runtime
Bumped version to 4.5.1 across all files
nextSteps: Run /claude-harness:setup on target projects to verify fix
Test user-prompt-submit.sh no longer reports stale features

recentChanges: v4.5.1: Fix version tracking - dynamic setup.md, stale state detection, cleanup legacy loops/
v4.5.0: Native Tasks integration - 5-task workflow chain with visual progress tracking
v4.4.2: Fix Stop hook - convert from prompt-type (unreliable JSON) to command-type (shell script)
v4.4.1: End-to-end /flow command + Stop hook schema fix
v4.4.0: Automated end-to-end /flow command, prompt-based hooks, GitHub caching, parallel memory reads
v4.3.0: Enforce GitHub issue creation - mandatory with full body templates
